widgets.label: ⇅

Rectangle: White, Round Corners 1px Dotted
Filtered Events
widgets.label: attachment://filteredEvents
widgets.extra_filter: action is not 'KEEP' and projectId in {{PROJ_ID}}

segments.extra_filter: action is not 'KEEP' and projectId in {{PROJ_ID}}

segments1.extra_filter: a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and a_repeat_count greaterthan 1 and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and a_repeat_count greaterthan 1 and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and  a_repeat_count > 1 and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and  a_repeat_count > 1 and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})

segments.extra_filter: a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and  a_correlation_status in ['CORRELATED', 'CORRELATING'] and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and a_repeat_count greaterthan 1 and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and a_repeat_count greaterthan 1 and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and a_correlation_status in ['ACTIVE', 'CORRELATING', 'CORRELATED', 'CLEARED'] and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
i_itsm_ticket_number not in 'Not Available' and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and a_status in 'ACTIVE' and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
a_source_systemname is not-in 'Alert Group' and a_correlation_status not-in 'AGGREGATE' and a_status in 'CLEARED' and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
i_itsm_ticket_number not in 'Not Available' and (project_id in {{PROJ_ID}})
